<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

<ServicesConfiguration><Service name="SoapSecurityTokenService" version="1.0"><Schema i18nFileName="soapSTS"  i18nKey="soap_security_token_service_description"  propertiesViewBeanURL="../sts/SoapSTSEdit"  resourceName="soap-sts"  revisionNumber="1"  serviceHierarchy="/DSAMEConfig/SoapSecurityTokenService" >

            <Organization hideConfigUI="no" >
